bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names tai qian li 胎前痢 , free-flux illness preceding delivery; tai li 胎痢 , embryo-related delivery. Pathological Condition of li ji 痢疾 , ailment of free-flux illness, affecting women during pregnancy. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bai yang 白楊 quoting Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 2 ：白楊皮，治妊娠下痢 , “ Bai yang pi cures pregnancy-related discharge with free-flux illness”, writes: 止孕痢 , “It ends pregnancy-related free-flux illness ”.
